name: Project_unkown
description:
You read it right!  It's an endless runner.

The game is fast paced has a really good library of obstacles and awesome functionality.

There are some things in the game that are not very clear(psst it's the obstacles) this is on you(the player) to figure how what behaves with what. One thing that i would like to add(since it's unique to this game) is that you can use the gun given to you to shoot down some obstacles.

I really enjoyed making this game and even though it's a bit clunky and not the most aesthetically pleasing or optimized game the core game play loop is very fun, trust me.

I do plan on updating it as much as possible.

Some upcoming updates include:

A texture update,

Optimization patches,

And most importantly Custom Key binds!!!

Oh and eventually a story line.

Obviously all of this will take a while and till then i hope you enjoy this little clunky sorta ugly looking 99% bug free awesome game.

ENJOY :)

Meant to run on windows(64bit)

It takes quite a bit of GPU usage download wisely.

Version:1.0.0
